dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Monarda{/it}) of coarse annual or perennial North American mints with a tubular calyx and whorls of showy flowers

et: New Latin, from Nicolás {it}Monardes{/it} †1588 Spanish botanist
shortdef: any of a genus (Monarda) of coarse annual or perennial North American mints with a tubular calyx and whorls of showy flowers
